description:
This market refers to the Valorant match between Esprit Shōnen and WIP Esports in the VCL France: Revolution Group Stage, scheduled for January 17 at 9:00AM ET.

This market will resolve to "WIP Esports" if WIP Esports wins 2 or more maps than Esprit Shōnen in this match.

Otherwise, this market will resolve to "Esprit Shōnen".

If the match is canceled (not played at all), ends in a tie, or is delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a winner determined, this market will resolve to 50-50. 

If the match begins but is not completed, and one team wins due to the opponent's forfeiture, disqualification, or walkover, this market will resolve to 50-50. 

If the match ends in a forfeit, disqualification, or walkover (team withdraws before the start and the other wins automatically), this market will resolve to 50-50.

events.description:
This market will resolve to "Esprit Shōnen" if Esprit Shōnen win against WIP Esports in the named Valorant match in the VCL France: Revolution Group Stage, scheduled for January 17 at 9:00AM ET.

This market will resolve to "WIP Esports" if WIP Esports win against Esprit Shōnen in the Valorant match.

If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed.

If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.

The resolution source for this market will be official information from https://liquipedia.net/valorant/Main_Page.
events.title: Valorant: Esprit Shōnen vs WIP Esports (BO3) - VCL France: Revolution Group Stage

groupItemTitle: Map Handicap: WIP (-1.5) vs Esprit Shōnen (+1.5)
